alert.note: Alert for Becker; Beltrami; Clearwater; Hubbard; Mahnomen; Norman; Otter Tail; Polk; Wadena (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 20 at 7:41PM CDT until June 20 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 800 PM CDT FOR HUBBARD...NORTHERN WADENA...NORTHEASTERN NORMAN...SOUTHEASTERN POLK...NORTHEASTERN OTTER TAIL...SOUTHWESTERN BELTRAMI...MAHNOMEN... BECKER AND CLEARWATER COUNTIES... At 740 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 6 miles east of Winger to White Earth Nation to near Sebeka, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Law enforcement has reported a roof blown off near Lake Park Minnesota. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. These severe storms will be near... Nimrod around 745 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these severe thunderstorms include Huntersville, Long Lost Lake, Bad Medicine Lake, Ebro, Weme, Zerkel, Lake Itasca, Bagley and Clearbrook. TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Becker; Beltrami; Clearwater; Hubbard; Mahnomen; Norman; Otter Tail; Polk; Wadena
